My world of the code — liticer's blog
Google grid gallery
By liticer, 2014-05-14 00:00:00 +0800, 0 comments.

This post has been updated!

A responsive image grid gallery based on the Google Chromebook getting started guide gallery ported to Jekyll.

This is an experiment by @crnacura ported to Jekyll.

How to use (local deployment)

  • Download & extract package
  • Use the normal process of serving a jekyll site. More details
  • Put image in /img/large and a thumnail version with the same file name in /img/thumb
  • Follow this sample front-matter
---
layout: default
date:   2014-04-06 23:26:12
photo: 1.png
caption_header: Sample header
caption: sample caption
---
  • Run jekyll commands to serve site

Screenshot

Contact

You are welcome to fork this repository. Do contact me in case of any issues or questions.

More Vimm!
